```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(Seurat)
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(SingleCellExperiment)
library(cowplot)
library(knitr)
library(sctransform)
library(Matrix)
library(future)
library(future.apply)
```

```{r}
macrophage <- readRDS(here('explore/RDS/macrophage_journal_replicaton3.RDS'))
```

```{r}
DefaultAssay(macrophage) <- "RNA"
```

```{r}
FCN1_faetures <- c("FCN1" , "IL18","S100A8", "CD14")
SPP1_features <- c("SPP1", "MERTK", "GPR183", "CCL13", "TGFB1")
FABP4_features <- c("FABP4", "INHBA", "APOC1", "MARCO")
```

```{r}
FeaturePlot(macrophage, features = FCN1_faetures)
FeaturePlot(macrophage, features = SPP1_features)
FeaturePlot(macrophage, features = FABP4_features)
```
